scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=development AUTH=off nodemon src/app.js --exec babel-node
scripts.dev_auth: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=development AUTH=on nodemon src/app.js --exec babel-node
scripts.debug: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=development nodemon src/app.js --exec babel-node --debug
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src -d dist -s && copy package.json dist && cd dist && mkdir public && mkdir api_docs && cd .. && cp public/index.html dist/public/ && cp api_docs/swagger.yaml dist/api_docs/
